categories: Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: This Jedi Master took Padawan Shen-Ji Collun as the Jedi's apprentice during the waning years of the Galactic Republic. During the Clone Wars, the Jedi Master told Collun that she was now two months away from undergoing the Trials of Knighthood, and becoming a Jedi Knight.
